## Download and Install

Please download the database from:

1. Database with protein annotation information [pycom.db]()
2. Database of coevolution matrices [pycom.mat]()
3. Please note that you can only access individual alignment files from [here]()

***

### Using Pip

```
pip install git+https://github.com/scdantu/pycom
```
